name: Penn Highlands Lung Center
address: Multiple locations in Central PA, including Clearfield, PA
description: Offers comprehensive pulmonary care with nine clinics throughout Central PA, specializing in asthma, emphysema, COPD, and lung cancer

name: UPMC Pulmonary and Sleep Medicine
address: Various locations including Annville, Carlisle, Gettysburg, Harrisburg, Lancaster, Lititz, and Mechanicsburg, PA
description: Provides evaluation and treatment for respiratory illnesses, breathing difficulties, and sleep disorders, with a team of pulmonologists covering a wide range of conditions

name: Harron Lung Center at Penn Medicine
address: Philadelphia, PA (specific address for the center can be found on their website)
description: Offers advanced diagnosis and treatment options for chronic lung disorders, with a team of expert clinicians and researchers

name: Temple Health - Pulmonologists
address: Philadelphia, PA (multiple hospital and clinic locations)
description: Features board-certified pulmonologists who diagnose and treat complex lung diseases with cutting-edge care and research-driven innovation

name: Pulmonology Associates, Inc.
description: Provides Pulmonary Medicine, Critical Care, and Sleep Disorder Medicine services

name: Mount Nittany Health Pulmonary Medicine
address: State College, PA (143 Hospital Drive, Suite 201) and Reedsville, PA (96 Kish Road)
description: Offers a comprehensive approach to diagnosing, treating, and rehabilitating various lung disorders, including advanced robotic bronchoscopy for lung cancer

name: Dr. Rohit Mehta
address: Indiana Regional Medical Center, IASA Building, 841 Hospital Road, Suite 2700, Indiana, PA 15701
description: Specializes in pulmonary and critical care medicine, with expertise in advanced bronchoscopy techniques

name: Dr. Imran Bajwa
address: Indiana Regional Medical Center, 850 Hospital Road, Suite 2400, Indiana, PA 15701
description: Provides Pulmonary Medicine services and is affiliated with Indiana Regional Medical Center

name: Dr. Hiral Patel
address: Penn Medicine Valley Forge, 1001 Chesterbrook Boulevard, Berwyn, PA, 19312
description: Specializes in a wide range of lung diseases and sleep disorders

name: Dr. Audreesh Banerjee
address: Penn Medicine locations including University City, Philadelphia, PA
description: Specializes in pulmonary and critical care medicine with clinical expertise in asthma, chronic cough, and COPD
